mapper.select: select * from statistics where DATE_FORMAT(statisticsdate, "%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(now(), "%Y-%m-%d")
select IFNULL(count(*), 0) from statistics where DATE_FORMAT(statisticsdate, "%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(now(), "%Y-%m-%d")
mapper.update: update statistics set visit = visit + 1 where DATE_FORMAT(statisticsdate, "%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(now(), "%Y-%m-%d")
